section.name: Introduction
section.p: This is a module which contains all minor stuff which does not belong to another module, but is used multiple times over and over again.

WARNING: Because this module is a collection of minor stuff which is used by other modules, it is not meant to be used for projects outside of PureSol Technologies, because everything in here will be replaced by an implementations better suited for the task at hand as soon as a fitting alternative is found. Nevertheless, it can be used, but there is no support for it.
This is module also does not conform to the rule of semantic versioning . The implementation may change and may be removed anytime.
